puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 1 werewolf below Kara are neighbors of Violet
puzzle.statement: “Kara’s shadow twitched last night… and one of the beasts lurking beneath her keeps circling Violet. Just one—always watching her.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 3 werewolfs below Celia are neighbors of Emmett
puzzle.statement: “Celia’s brilliance attracts monsters… three roam beneath her, but only one has ever dared creep close to Emmett. I’ve seen it.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 3 werewolfs neighboring Gemma are neighbors of Uma
puzzle.statement: “Gemma’s stern gaze scares off most wolves… but one of the creatures near her keeps drifting toward Uma. Only one dares.”
“Celia’s mind spins too fast for wolves to hide from her. She swears there’s just one lurking immediately to her left… and I believe her.”
“Emmett’s right side… only one person there still feels human warmth. Just one. The rest? Their eyes don’t blink right.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Fiona has fewer werewolf neighbors than Flora
puzzle.statement: “Fiona sleeps lightly—wolves avoid that. Flora, though… something about her cold stare draws more of them. I’ve counted.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Silas and Violet have the same number of villager neighbors
puzzle.statement: “Silas and Violet… funny pair. Every friendly face around Silas seems mirrored around Violet. Balance like that isn’t coincidence.”
“Above Silas? Only one soul there still smells of honest earth. The others hide something darker.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: exactly 1 of the 2 werewolfs below Franklin are neighbors of Odette
puzzle.statement: “Two beasts lurk just beneath Franklin, but Odette only ever crosses paths with one of them. She tracks perfection—even in monsters.”

puzzle.mechanic_statement: Arthur has fewer villager neighbors than Kara
puzzle.statement: “Arthur’s rage scares off good folk—he barely keeps any near him. Kara? Villagers cling to her even when she pushes them away.”
“Row 1… there’s no true villager left up here. I feel the lies clinging to every voice.”
“Emmett? Oh, he howled last night. Loud enough that even Kara flinched. Don’t pretend you didn’t hear it.”
“Row 5… every heartbeat down there thuds wrong. Not a single villager breathes among them.”
“Believe what you want—Kara stands firm for this village. I’d stake my life on her humanity.”
I have nothing to say. Sigh.”

gameSetting: A quiet village is stalked by werewolves each night. Find the beasts hiding among you.
